channel.title: Crash in WGH
channel.description: I died when the soldiers are repelling down the shaft in WGH, after the air striking part. As soon as it went to reload my last save the game crashed and the below error appeared ![](upload://va9Mv3iNGiHbCGx0VA1aYy0o5nf.png) I've attached my error mdmp file as well Thanks hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T1_37_10C0.mdmp (97.3 KB)
